name: Cristie Kerr
description:
Dear Miss Kerr,

We gotta be honest with you. We don't know you from Jane Doe. That is rather unfortunate, since you're one of the best golfers in the world, a winner of multiple majors, and have been ranked number one numerous times. But if you pass us on the street, we might turn our heads, sure, but just for a fleeting moment.

Dear Miss Kerr,

How should we put it... You gotta expose yourself a little more. You have to... peel back the layers and reveal what's hiding underneath. You gotta show that you're more than just a golfer. We guarantee you that you will no long be anonymous. Your fanbase will grow. You could become more, oh, so much more!

Dear Miss Kerr,

Maybe it's time to reveal that you're Jewish?
